blog.name: phandomreversebang
blog.title: Phandom Reverse Bang 2019
blog.description:
Welcome to the 4th edition of the Phandom Reverse Bang! We're a big bang in reverse; artists create themed pieces of art, and authors claim said work to write a fic based around them! 
  Mobile Navigation

title: 🚨We Need Artists🚨
body:
Hello everyone! 

We have a solid number of artists signed up, however, it’s less than half of the total number of artists that have been signed up in the past. 

If we don’t get artists, it’s going to be extremely limiting to the phanfic authors and betas who do want to participate in the event! 

Art can be anything from line art to gifs, graphic edits, moodboards, edits that can be done on a phone app, original songs, videos, drawn art (traditional and Digital), and so so so much more! 

If you have an idea for art but you’re afraid you’re not talented enough, don’t worry and sign up! We’re not judging on talent and any author is going to love having your prompt and art to write about! 

If you don’t think what you want to do is considered art, ask us and we’re sure that it will be! 

And finally, we just ask that even if you don’t want to do the event, that you reblog this post to reach people who might want to! We just want to see the event succeed and it can’t with the few sign ups we have. 

If you want more information and the link to the sign up post, click here

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: hey, just wanted to say that I appreciate having someone willing to speak up and be real about some of the bullshit in this...
question: hey, just wanted to say that I appreciate having someone willing to speak up and be real about some of the bullshit in this fandom. I think you're really good at articulating your thoughts. You and @dramaphan are the only things keeping me sane around here lol. Good to know not everyone is a total crackhead <3
answer:
Thank you so much for taking the time to send this, I really appreciate it. I haven’t been around as much lately (it’s hard for me to stay as engaged as I was with relative silence from Dan), but the reason I made this blog in the first place was because I got sick of seeing people steamrolled by the very vocal tinhatters and knew that I would be able to share a different perspective without being intimidated by them. I really think the phandom has huge problems with selective listening and confirmation bias, among other things (not just restricted to “phan”), and they are huge factors in the poor communication between Dan and Phil and us and create lots of other issues too, so it’s really important for people to put unpopular and/or dissenting opinions out there (even if they are mostly ignored). I have seen people go as far as to ask blogs to add trigger warnings when discussing potential outcomes that aren’t what they prefer (ex. DAPG not returning from hiatus), which is completely ridiculous. I am usually happy to share my opinions so feel free to send me asks anytime…at least I can get some use out of my psychology degree, even if it is armchair-analyzing madness on the internet

Cc @dramaphan who keeps me sane too (although I do believe that blog is where the Dan/Miss Benny shippers were last seen smoking crack)!

summary: dan talking abt the black hole picture, i honestly love that. like ive been waiting for the black hole pic for like ten days...
body: dan talking abt the black hole picture, i honestly love that. like ive been waiting for the black hole pic for like ten days since i heard that they might release the picture on the tenth of april. and i dont know what i felt when i saw it but now dan tweeted about it so God Bless Them for that; it made dan tweet.

title: Leaves and Currents
body:
Rating: G

Word Count: 1.2k

Summary: After the summer of endless rain, Phil wound up in new corners of the forest that other water sprites hadn’t dwelt in ages. He’d known woodland sprites before, of course. Dan was something different, or so Phil felt.

An au fic about forests and wanting to help.

title: meet me at red dragon
body:
chapter twenty

rating: m

words: 3.7k (79.6k in total)

summary: phil lester is a single 31 year old with a wild eight year old, ethan. dan howell is single 27 year old with a quiet five year old, noah. when they meet at their son’s swim lessons, for some reason phil can’t get the pretty brown eyed stranger out of his head.

read on ao3

start from the beginning

reblog.comment:
chapter twenty

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Phil’s merch is obvious a last minute cash grab. I don’t really think Dan is ever coming back, he’s clearly in denial, Phil is...
question: Phil’s merch is obvious a last minute cash grab. I don’t really think Dan is ever coming back, he’s clearly in denial, Phil is trying to keep the phans happy by posting recycled content. The fact Phil said he’s trying to change up his content this year was a complete lie, yes he’s censoring himself less, but the content is so dry and unoriginal?! People who are defending them are stupid, I know they don’t owe us anything but holy hell they would be nothing without us.
answer: And you sure are allowed to have an opinion, anon.

reblog.comment: And you sure are allowed to have an opinion, anon.

trail.content_raw: And you sure are allowed to have an opinion, anon.
trail.content: And you sure are allowed to have an opinion, anon.

summary: 2012 was way worse lol. 2019 is nothing or have I missed something?

answer: 2012 was the year Dan got tired of the Phandom bullshit and tried to call it out. 2019 is the year 90% of content has completely ceased to exist.
